Hi @abideZLQ 
Thanks for your report.
Can you try a newer version? The latest release is 5.0.0-beta,  and '3.1.0' is outdated
@tristaZero

Hi @pkwenda  
This is not a connection pool problem, it is that underscore configuration parameters are no longer allowed to be used above springboot2.0.
> Invalid characters: '_'
    Bean: org.apache.shardingsphere.spring.boot.ShardingSphereAutoConfiguration
    Reason: Canonical names should be kebab-case ('-' separated), lowercase alpha-numeric characters and must start with a letter

So it's not a bug.

@future94
Is your problem solved?  Can we close this issue?

Hi @lancecpdd 
Is your problem solved? Can we close this issue?
Thank you for your reply. I tried the latest version as you said, but it still happened

OK.   
But we have used Sharding-JDBC to do a lot of tests, and we haven't encountered the situation you mentioned. Can you provide a sample project on github?   It will help us to reproduce the problem. Thank you!

Please refer to #10844 , You can try the latest version by build master branch.
